meanings.sent1: She gave an unenthusiastically response to the invitation.
meanings.sent2: The unenthusiastically crowd barely clapped at the end of the show.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail unenthusiastically when offered a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden drooped unenthusiastically under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: His unenthusiastically expression showed his lack of interest in the topic.

meanings.definition: In a lackluster or unenthusiastic manner.
meanings.sent1: She completed the task unenthusiastically, dragging her feet along the way.
meanings.sent2: The team played unenthusiastically, resulting in a loss.
meanings.sent3: The comedian delivered his jokes unenthusiastically, causing the audience to yawn.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew unenthusiastically through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The student read the poem unenthusiastically, lacking emotion in her voice.
